00028 //========================================================================
00029 //  Content References in Game Coding Complete 2nd Edition
00030 // 
00031 //  TextStyle - a class to encapsulate font creation parameters. Using text
00032 //              styles in your game is similar to using CSS on a web site - it
00033 //              becomes very easy to change the entire look of the game.
00034 //
00035 //  FontHandler - a useful class that preloads font definitions. The wise
00036 //                programmer would make this class read from a data file...
00037 //                It is also responsible for drawing fonts onto surfaces.
00038 // 
00039 //========================================================================

00049 TextStyle::TextStyle(
00050         FontEnum font, 
00051         Color foreground, 
00052         Color background, 
00053         int format,
00054         optional<TextShadow> shadow )
00055 {
00056         m_font = font;
00057         m_foreground = foreground;
00058         m_background = background; 
00059         m_format = format;
00060         m_shadow = shadow;
00061 }
00062 
00063 TextStyle & TextStyle::operator = (const TextStyle &other) 
00064 {
00065         m_shadow.clear();
00066         m_font = other.m_font;
00067         m_foreground = other.m_foreground;
00068         m_background = other.m_background; 
00069         m_format = other.m_format;
00070         if (other.m_shadow.valid())
00071                 m_shadow = TextShadow((*(other.m_shadow)).m_color, (*(other.m_shadow)).m_offset) ;
00072         
00073         return *this;
00074 }

00102 // 
00103 // FontHandler::FontHandler - Chapter 10, page 333
00104 //
00105 FontHandler::FontHandler()
00106 {
00107         for (int i=0; i<MAX_FONTS; ++i)
00108         {
00109                 HRESULT hr;
00110                 ID3DXFont *pFont = NULL;
00111                 hr = D3DXCreateFontIndirect(DXUTGetD3DDevice(),&m_FontRecords[i], &pFont);
00112                 if (hr==S_OK && pFont) 
00113                 {
00114                         m_pFonts[i] = GCC_NEW Font(pFont);
00115                 }
00116                 else
00117                 {
00118                         TCHAR msg[256];
00119                         _tcssprintf(msg, _T("Font error: Couldn't initialize %s"), m_FontRecords[i].FaceName);
00120                         MessageBox(g_pApp->GetHwnd(), msg, _T("Error"), MB_OK);
00121                         assert(0 && msg);
00122                         m_pFonts[i] = NULL;
00123                 }
00124         }
00125 }
00126 
00127 
00128 // 
00129 // FontHandler::~FontHandler - Chapter 10, page 333
00130 //
00131 FontHandler::~FontHandler()
00132 {
00133         for (int i=0; i<MAX_FONTS; ++i)
00134         {
00135                 SAFE_DELETE(m_pFonts[i]);
00136         }
00137 }

00139 // 
00140 // FontHandler::GetStringSize - Chapter 10, page 333
00141 //
00142 CSize FontHandler::GetStringSize(std::wstring const &s, Font *font, int format) const
00143 {
00144         CRect rect(0,0,0,0);
00145         if (font->m_d3dFont->DrawText(NULL, s.c_str(), -1, &rect, DT_CALCRECT | format, 0)==0)
00146         {
00147                 return CSize(0,0);
00148         }
00149 
00150         return rect.BottomRight();
00151 }
00152 
00153 // 
00154 // FontHandler::GetStringSize - Chapter 10, page 334
00155 //
00156 CSize const FontHandler::GetStringSize(std::wstring const &text, TextStyle const style) const 
00157 {
00158         assert(text.length() && "Empty text sprites are not allowed!");
00159 
00160         CSize sizeText( 0, 0 );
00161 
00162         sizeText = GetStringSize(text, m_pFonts[style.m_font], style.m_format);
00163 
00164         if (style.m_shadow.valid())
00165         {
00166                 CPoint offset = (*(style.m_shadow)).m_offset;
00167                 sizeText.cx += abs( offset.x );
00168                 sizeText.cy += abs( offset.y );
00169         }
00170 
00171         return sizeText;
00172 }

00175 // 
00176 // FontHandler::GetHeight - Chapter 10, page 334
00177 //
00178 int     FontHandler::GetHeight( const TextStyle style) const
00179 {
00180         std::wstring space = _T(" ");
00181         CSize size = GetStringSize(space, style);
00182         return size.cy;
00183 }
00184 
00185 // 
00186 // FontHandler::GetStringWidth - Chapter 10, page 334
00187 //
00188 int     FontHandler::GetStringWidth(std::wstring const &s,  const TextStyle style) const
00189 {
00190         return GetStringSize(s, style).cx;
00191 }

00193 // 
00194 // FontHandler::ParseMessage - Chapter 10, page 334
00195 //
00196 std::wstring const FontHandler::ParseMessage( std::wstring const & nmessage, const TextStyle style, const CSize & size ) const
00197 {
00198         //Initialize
00199         std::wstring line;
00200         std::wstring word;
00201         std::wstring multilineMessage;
00202         std::wstring message = nmessage;
00203 
00204         std::wstring potentialLine;
00205 
00206         TCHAR ch;
00207 
00208         // seperators
00209         static const int MAX_SEPS( 5 );
00210         TCHAR seps[MAX_SEPS+1] = _T("\n\t,- ");
00211 
00212         while (message.length())
00213         {
00214                 //Remove the first single character from 'message'
00215                 ch = message[ 0 ];
00216                 message = message.substr(1);
00217 
00218                 //Append that character to the word, making sure not to append lineBreak
00219                 if(ch!=seps[0])
00220                 {
00221                         word += ch;
00222                 }
00223 
00224                 potentialLine = line + word;
00225 
00226                 //If the potentialLine is too wide, then end this line
00227                 if(GetStringWidth(potentialLine,style)>size.cx)
00228                 {
00229                         TrimLeft(line);
00230                         multilineMessage += line;
00231                         multilineMessage += '\n';
00232                         line = _T("");
00233                 }
00234 
00235                 //End a word when it is complete
00236                 for ( int i = 0; i < MAX_SEPS; i++ )
00237                 {
00238                         if ( ch == seps[ i ] )
00239                         {
00240                                 line += word;
00241                                 word = _T("");
00242 
00243                                 //Make sure the lineBreaks transfer over
00244                                 if(ch==seps[0])
00245                                 {
00246                                         multilineMessage += line;
00247                                         multilineMessage += seps[0];
00248                                         line = _T("");
00249                                 }
00250                                 break;
00251                         }
00252                 }
00253         }//end while loop
00254 
00255         //Append what is left of the remaining line and word
00256         line += word;
00257         TrimLeft(line);
00258         multilineMessage += line;
00259 
00260         return multilineMessage;
00261 }//end ParseMessage

00266 // 
00267 // FontHandler::DrawText - Chapter 10, page 336
00268 //
00269 HRESULT FontHandler::DrawText(
00270         Sprite *sprite,
00271         const std::wstring strText,
00272         const TextStyle style,
00273         const CPoint & origin
00274         ) const
00275 {
00276         Font *pFont = m_pFonts[style.m_font];
00277         ID3DXSprite *xSprite = (ID3DXSprite *)sprite->GetSurface();
00278         CRect rect(0,0,0,0);
00279         pFont->m_d3dFont->DrawText(xSprite, strText.c_str(), -1, &rect, DT_CALCRECT | style.m_format, style.m_foreground);
00280 
00281         if(style.m_shadow.valid())//Draw the shadow if you must
00282         {
00283                 TextShadow shadow = *(style.m_shadow);
00284                 //The shadow text gets drawn first, with the background color intact
00285 
00286                 CRect shadowRect = rect;
00287                 shadowRect.MoveToXY(rect.left + shadow.m_offset.x, rect.top + shadow.m_offset.y);
00288                 pFont->m_d3dFont->DrawText(xSprite, strText.c_str(), -1, &shadowRect, style.m_format, shadow.m_color);
00289         }
00290 
00291         pFont->m_d3dFont->DrawText(xSprite, strText.c_str(), -1, &rect, style.m_format, style.m_foreground);
00292 
00293     return S_OK;
00294 }
